data.title: Why is Paramount Pictures the weakest of the major studios nowadays?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 4): Corporate shenanigans. Sumner Redstone split up Paramount, Viacom cable (MTV, VH1), CBS, et al into 2 companies in order to ‘double his money.’ He held the voting shares of both companies so in effect, it was still all Viacom but legally, they were both smaller companies without ...
